original_text: And I gave thee thy master's house, and thy master's wives into thy bosom, and gave thee the house of Israel and of Judah; and if that had been too little, I would moreover have given unto thee such and such things.
korean_text: 네 주인의 집을 네게 주고 네 주인의 아내들을 네 품에 두고 이스라엘과 유다 족속을 네게 맡겼느니라 만일 그것이 부족하였을 것 같으면 내가 네게 이것 저것을 더 주었으리라

sentences.original_text: And I gave thee thy master's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 너에게 네 주인의 집을 주었고

sentences.original_text: and thy master's wives into thy bosom
sentences.korean_translation: 네 주인의 아내들을 네 품에 주었으며

sentences.original_text: and gave thee the house of Israel and of Judah
and if that had been too little
I would moreover have given unto thee
